Package cryptoTrader.broker

Class Broker

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.broker.Broker
Direct Known Subclasses:
Broker1, Broker2, Broker3, Broker4
public abstract class Broker
extends java.lang.Object
This class will create an abstract broker object that will store the number of strategies successfully performed
Author:
Gleb Zvonkov

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Broker()
    Constructor method that will create an abstract broker object that will store the number of strategies successfully performed

  • Method Summary

    boolean execute()
